properties.name: app.stage
properties.description: Application env for Bugsnag.

properties.name: app.server.url
properties.description: URL where site resides. Value added to short link.

properties.name: app.dev-mode
properties.description: Defines if application works in Development Mode. Dev Mode enables developer features (i.e. Debug Page).

properties.name: app.telegram.enabled
properties.description: Defines is telegram integration is enabled or not.

properties.name: app.telegram.token
properties.description: String with token for telegram.

properties.name: app.site.title
properties.description: String with Site title for displaying at web page.

properties.name: app.server.short-url
properties.description: Short url domain used for links.

properties.name: app.seo.robots.crawl-allowed
properties.description: Defines if search engine crawlers are allowed to crawl site.

properties.name: app.redirect-page.bypass-symbol
properties.description: Special symbol, which should be added to ident to bypass (skip) redirect page.

properties.name: app.redirect-page.timeout
properties.description: Timeout in second after which redirect page makes actual redirect.

properties.name: app.session.timeout
properties.description: Vaadin Session Timeout in seconds.

properties.name: app.redis.prefix
properties.description: Application-specific prefix in Redis Keys. Needed to distinguish application's session if they stored within same Redis DB.

properties.name: app.mail.email4errors
properties.description: Email address for sending errors.

properties.name: app.mail.from-address
properties.description: E-Mail Address used in FROM field in email.

properties.name: app.mail.credentials.username
properties.description: GMail Username.

properties.name: app.mail.credentials.password
properties.description: GMail password.

properties.name: app.mail.debug
properties.description: Enables/Disables Mail (SMTP) Debugging output.

properties.name: app.telegram.bot-name
properties.description: String with name of Telegram Bot.

properties.name: app.show-rename-notification
properties.description: Enables/Disables Yalsee is now Axe notification.

properties.name: app.seo.piwik.enabled
properties.description: Enables/Disables Piwik.

properties.name: app.seo.piwik.piwikHost
properties.description: Hostname of piwik instance. Just hostname without protocol.

properties.name: app.seo.piwik.siteId
properties.description: String with Piwik Site Id. See it in Piwik UI.
